events.title: CDKL5 Gene Therapy - Meet the Clinical Team!
events.description: Join us for a Clinical Team Dinner at the University of California San Francisco. All are welcome. Dinner will be served. Please RSVP to CDKL5@ChildsCure.org

events.title: Gene Therapy for CDKL5: The History, Progress & Next Steps
events.description: The US FDA has provided positive feedback + IND suggestions for gene replacement therapy for CDKL5.
events.hostedBy: American Society of Gene + Cell Therapy & Child's Cure Genetic Research
